website_summaries.verdict: A real bargain for 3 durable swim caps for kids.
pros: Comes in a 3-pack with one each of purple, dark blue, and rose red
cons: Not for kids with long hair
Some buyers said these run small, even for kids

customer_reviews.title: I like that there's no logos
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine light weight curly hair that's at shoulder length, so I don't have a problem with these sliding off. I would imagine it would be harder to use for those with long thick hair. I don't like gear with logos on them, so its a plus that these have no designs on them. These sort of look like they were stitched at home, so I suggest not putting them in the washing machine. However, they do the job and they're cheap. would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Badgrlroro

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Given the reviews I was concerned about fit however these fit my head which is adult sized (~7). They are reasonably comfortable. I do not think that they will hold a lot of hair however I do have somewhat long hair. Also, they have a rather broad band of elastic compared to Speedo or other brands that I have worn. As a result, I find them more comfortable to put over my ears. Overall, a great value.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyCal

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty small head and these are too small for me and my 11 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: momofzam

customer_reviews.title: Better alternative to the rubber plastic caps
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my toddler. Hair will still get wet but it’s my ideal choice for pools that require caps. A much better alternative to the rubber plastic caps
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! I bought these for a swimming class for my Little son and they were so bad in quality. They didn’t fir his head which I think is a regular normal size head for a 6 yr old and they showed rip at the seams. Look like they will definitely rip at the seam if stretched to wear. Have not used them even once !! Don’t waste your money. It’s true ! It sounded too good to be true!
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth Sharda

customer_reviews.title: Swim caps for people with short hair.
customer_reviews.text: These swim caps are of nice enough quality, but they run a tad small. I do not have long hair, and my head is rather small, so it works for me. Would not recommend for anyone with long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your hair from your eyes in pool but not dry
customer_reviews.text: They in no way actually keep your head at all dry. But you’ll look fabulous in pool so who cares. Stops kids bangs getting wet in their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: IrishBookWorm

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these but they fit too big on my 6 year old and I was under the impression they are for kids . I kept them to see if she grows into them , hopefully they will and I can give a better review
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower1012

customer_reviews.title: Snugness good for pool, not for a skullcap
customer_reviews.text: Elastic would be good for swimming, to keep hair out of face, but it is too snug to wear around the house when I have hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Lou S. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Fits well even over long hair. Lasting nicely even in pool with lots of chlorine
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Too large for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is too large for kids. Fit me fine as an adult but my 7 year old couldnt wear it
customer_reviews.author: Steve Nelson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: doesn't tear out hair! works for my toddler and on my husband!
customer_reviews.author: EmpireCity

customer_reviews.title: Bad swimming cap, great sleeping cap
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work as a water resistant swim cap but I found another use for it. It's great as a sleeping cap. Didn't come off during the night. Kept my hair in place.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Great product to wear on the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great product, use this with my bathing suit to match.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If you buy these you might as well not wear a cap at all and just jump in the water. These caps do not work!
customer_reviews.author: Cjc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra large heads
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and these caps run loose / large
customer_reviews.author: sbjonny

customer_reviews.title: Fits too big for 3 years toddler
customer_reviews.text: Fits big for my toddler but is a nice product. The fabric is great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Reissig

customer_reviews.title: Use it for my daughters in our Jeep
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love riding in our Jeep with the top down but nothing worked to keep their hair out of their face and from getting in a tangled mess. Pony tail holders, bandannas even du-rags didn't work. These worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: They are awfully small!
customer_reviews.text: It's funny, some people said these were too small for their head but, these were way too big for my child's head. They are definitely not meant for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jay TelRav

customer_reviews.title: Good buys
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and well fitted, they go well with the multi colored swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cap for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my daughter. Her hair got damp but these aren’t rubbery so they were easy to get on and off and didn’t pull her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Total Waste of money..... I wish I give minus or 0 rating for this.... it’s like a filter ..... water coming from all the ways and our hair gets wet....
customer_reviews.author: HARIPRIYA Mudumbi

customer_reviews.title: Very fashionable.
customer_reviews.text: They’re very cute, but you can’t wear them long because it’s to tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little bit small if you have long hair
customer_reviews.author: Thais

customer_reviews.title: comfortable & durable
customer_reviews.text: i am a swimmer. these are very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fight.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the bright colors. Fits perfect not too tight or too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Robin F. Owens

product_meta.title: HONBAY 3PCS Solid Color Lycra Swim Cap Swimming Cap Swimming Hat for Kids and Adult(not for Long Hair)
product_meta.description:
Material: polyamide 82% + spandex 18%
Color: light blue,navy blue,rose red,one for each color

Package included:
3pcs lycra pure color swimming caps

They are designed to fit for amateurs, also great for professionals
Fit for boys and girls, also for adult men and women;Do not recommend it for people with long hair 

Warm Tips:
1.Non-Waterproof
2.Do not recommend it for people with long hair
feature_bullets: Solid color lycra swimming cap, Pack of 3
Color: light blue,navy blue,rose red,one for each color(There may be some differences in color due to different batches.Sincerely hope that you can understand.Thank you!)
Lycra doesn't tear your hair like silicone or latex can; Comfortable to wear; Non-Waterproof
Fit for boys and girls, also for adult men and women;Do not recommend it for people with long hair
